name: StarFighter - An Amazing SHMUP
description:
StarFighter is a shoot ’em up using touch to shoot your way through the game, testing your nerves and reactions to their limits.

StarFighter is a shooting game that embraces the teachings of the shoot'em up genre.

StarFighter is a fast fighter game, with charming sound and music.

Are you ready to gather your Star Fighter to kill all the invaders and protect the galaxy? - Become the saviour of the galaxy now!
